metadata.title: CVE-2024-3862 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The MarkStack assignment operator, part of the JavaScript engine, couldaccess uninitialized memory if it were used in a self-assignment. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 125.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
